channel.title: NPC + HS Help Needed
channel.description:
I need help with 3 things,
1. How to rename an npc in game. For example make a level 2 man show up as noob. 2. How to give A mithril dragon the right Attack & death anims. 3. How to make highscores rank by XP not total level.

item.title: NPC + HS Help Needed
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

  1. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,470913.msg3443718.html#msg3443718 (aString65)
  2. npcHandler.java(search for isDead, should find it pretty quick) and for the attack emote find the right ID, then there is a spot to ad it in npcHandler also, but theres more than one possible spot( im guessing the 3 attack types… but not sure)
  3. THERES A SHIT LOAD OF TUTORIALS! just make it sort by a different variable. it receives XP and LEVEL so where it says LEVEL make it the COMBINED XP instead…[these are not the real variables, just use common sense]

Read full topic
